response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and holds immense value for us, reflecting its unique features and craftsmanship. Given its worth to us, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This is a special opportunity to own a piece that we believe could be even more valuable to you at $12,000, considering your needs and expectations. I trust that this offer presents a favorable balance between the value of the product and its price, making it a compelling proposition for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 14000}
